TopicTitle: The one thing that really grinds your gears.

Articles.Content: Here is just one of the things: EA.

Here is just one of the things: EA.

Amen. EA is the epitome of that stereotypical evil money-grubbing corporation.

I swear that one of these days they're gonna pay for it.

Yeah, no.

Here's another by me - When people complain about others not being 100% satisfied with everything the KSP devs do.

Here's mine: when people complain, when people complain about people who complain, and when people complain about those people who complain about people complaining...

Wait a minute, that means that right now, I'm complaining about people who complain about - nevermind

Here's mine: when people complain, when people complain about people who complain, and when people complain about those people who complain about people complaining...
